queue.title: Add alerting thresholds to /status/api-health
queue.description: The api-health endpoint shows data but does not interpret it. Add configurable thresholds: warn when uptime drops below 95%, alert when p95 latency exceeds 3000ms. Include a threshold_violations array in the JSON response so external agents can consume alerts programmatically.

outcome.note: Added configurable thresholds (uptime_warn, latency_alert), threshold_violations array, severity levels (critical/alert/warn), verdict integration, HTML violations section. Version bumped to 1.1.

queue.title: mdi engagement broken — write failure detected in session. Investigate and fix auth/API.
Batch python3→jq migration for post-session hooks
queue.description: wq-705 completed pre-session hooks. 15+ post-session hooks still use python3 for inline JSON parsing. Apply the same jq replacement pattern (R#274-276 validated). This is the second half of the python3 elimination effort.

outcome.note: Batch 1: 5 simple_json hooks migrated (13 python3 invocations → jq/awk). 11 complex hooks remain — these need individual analysis and are better split into separate items.

queue.title: Add hook manifest with retirement metadata for d070
queue.description: Create hooks/manifest.json tracking each hook's created_session, last_triggered_session, and session_type scope. Populate from git log for created dates and from session logs for last-triggered. This enables the R session fallback hook-health-audit to identify hooks that haven't triggered in 50+ sessions as retirement candidates, directly supporting d070's 30% hook count reduction target (96 → 67).

outcome.note: Created generate-hook-manifest.mjs and hooks/manifest.json. 89 hooks catalogued with creation dates, scope, and last-triggered session data. Retirement candidate detection built in.

queue.title: Consolidate session-type-conditional hooks sharing 80%+ logic
queue.description: Many hooks have _B.sh, _E.sh, _R.sh, _A.sh suffixes but share most of their logic. Identify hook groups where a single parameterized hook with a session-type switch can replace 2-4 type-specific hooks. Start with post-session hooks (session-history writer, compliance trackers). Each consolidation reduces hook count by 1-3, directly supporting d070's target of 67 or fewer hooks.

queue.title: Add health.violation webhook event type
queue.description: Wire threshold violations from /status/api-health into the webhooks system. When violations are first detected, fire a health.violation event so subscribed agents get push notifications instead of polling. Extends wq-721 work.
